description: We are seeking a talented Data Analyst to join our growing team...
responsibilities: Analyze large datasets to identify trends and insights
Build and maintain dashboards and reports

required: Bachelor's degree in Statistics, Mathematics, or related field
2+ years of experience in data analysis
Experience with data visualization tools (Tableau, Power BI)
preferred: Master's degree in Data Science or related field
Knowledge of cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP)
